title: Baker Mayfield Trade Reaction, Plus the Top 10 Coaches in the NFL
description:
Kevin, Ben, and Steven begin by reacting to the news of Baker Mayfield being traded to the Carolina Panthers. Then, they list their top 10 coaches going into the 2022-23 NFL season.

Host: Kevin Clark, Ben Solak, and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
